{\bfseries \mbox{[}interface\mbox{]}} Used to manage the creation and destruction of bodies. See \hyperlink{arch__sensorsystem}{Sensor System Concepts}.

\subsubsection{Detailed Description}
{\bfseries \mbox{[}interface\mbox{]}} Used to manage the creation and destruction of bodies. See \hyperlink{arch__sensorsystem}{Sensor System Concepts}.
